comment._content: I know the Sheets Family of Fireco. This is a very touching picture

comment._content:
Thanks for your comment, Whitby WV! Can you tell us more about the Sheets family?

Jerry (U.S. National Archives)

comment.author: 31541951@N07
comment._content: One of the Sheets Family, Bobby is buried at nearby Jonben WV. I believe it was mining, I am not 100% certain.

comment.author: 75372794@N04
comment._content: I also know this lady. Her husband's name was George. He and my father fished together and ran around together. I went to school with his son Billy. They used to live in Wilibet before moving to Fireco.         Fred

comment.author: 22997721@N04
comment._content: Lilly Mae Sheets is my husband JR Millers Grandmother.......Bobby fell off of a bridge at his house in Willibet Hollow when he was 7 years old and passed away as a result of his accident.
